featured.text: Today, the Paralympics are sports events for athletes from six different disability groups.
On June 19, 2001, an agreement was signed between the International Olympic Committee and the International Paralympics Committee to keep this 30 in the future.
From the 2012 bid onwards, the city chosen to host the Olympic Games will also host the Paralympics. 26.

definition.zh_def: 殘奧會：為殘疾運動員舉辦的國際體育賽事。
definition.en_def: The Paralympics: An international sports event for athletes with disabilities.
definition.example: She trained hard to compete in the Paralympics and inspire others.
